i5.las2peer.testing

Class TestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.api.Configurable
      • i5.las2peer.api.Service
        • i5.las2peer.testing.TestService

  • public class TestService
extends Service
    Simple test service for connectors to have a service with methods to call.
